thread.title: UK Retailer JD Sports Fashion to Buy Finish Line for About $558 Million

author: Aisha Al-Muslim
title: UK Retailer JD Sports Fashion to Buy Finish Line for About $558 Million
text:
Athletic-apparel retailer Finish Line Inc. has reached a deal to be acquired for about $558 million by JD Sports Fashion PLC, as the U.K. sportswear retailer looks across the Atlantic to expand its global footprint.
Under terms of the deal, JD will pay $13.50 in cash for each Finish Line share, which is about a 28% premium above Fridayâ€™s closing price of $10.55.
